text_logic_form: The triangles $ABC$ and $FDG$ are similar to each other.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The triangles $ABC$ and $FDG$ are similar to each other.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $DF$ is $12$.
The length of the line $QF$ is $8$.
The length of the line $AP$ is $x$.
The length of the line $AB$ is $15$.
The measure of angle $CAP$ is equal to the measure of angle $BAP$.
The measure of angle $GFQ$ is equal to the measure of angle $DFQ$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, and $BC$, forming the triangle $ABC$.
There are lines $DG$, $DQ$, and $FG$, forming the triangle $FDG$.
